original_text: Before, when you did not know God, you served false gods. They were not gods at all, but you were their slaves.
korean_text: 그러나 너희가 그 때에는 하나님을 알지 못하여 본질상 하나님이 아닌 자들에게 종 노릇 하였더니

sentences.original_text: Before, when you did not know God
sentences.korean_translation: 이전에, 당신이 하나님을 알지 못했을 때

sentences.original_text: They were not gods at all
